text: Awak nyang hana ‘eleumee jikheun Pakon di Tuhan hana Neupeugah Pakon ngon tanyoe hana Neumarit Atawa ayat Neubri le Allah Saban awak nyan ngon awak dilee Jikheun meuteuntee lagee jih peugah Meusaban ate bandum awaknyan Padahai kä tfang ayat meupeugah Ureueng nyang yakin nyang tem meuiman Bandum ureueng nyan meuphom sileupah
